welcomeMessage: I'm here to help you with your healthcare needs. Ask me anything about our services, appointments, or general health questions.

suggestions.bookAppointment: How can I book an appointment?

scheduleConfirmation.title: Schedule Confirmation

scheduleConfirmation.alreadyConfirmed: This schedule has already been confirmed.
